metadata.title: CVE-2017-6004 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: The compile_bracket_matchingpath function in pcre_jit_compile.c in PCRE through 8.x before revision 1680 (e.g., the PHP 7.1.1 bundled version) allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds read and application crash) via a crafted regular expression.

criterions.comment: pcre3 package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2:8.39-3').
